summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling resolution 1503 (2003) of 28 August 2003, 
Appoints Mr. Hassan Bubacar Jallow as Prosecutor of the International Tribunal for Rwanda, 
With effect from 15 September 2003 for a four-year term, 
As nominated by the Secretary-General, 
In accordance with Article 15(4) of the Statute of the International Tribunal for Rwanda.
